snippet.title: Terrorformer TD: Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Terrorformer TD is a tower defense roguelite with a procedurally generated map that YOU shape! Raise or lower tiles, divert enemy paths and funnel monsters into perfectly designed killzones. Draw cards to unlock and upgrade towers, terraform the battlefield to your advantage, and earn new perks with each run!

Coming 9/9/2024 to Steam! 
Wishlist today 👉 http://terrorformertd.com/in/y/

Boost by @Peyruismusic | https://soundcloud.com/peyruis
Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
Creative Commons / Attribution 3.0 Unported License (CC BY 3.0)
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/deed.en_US

Trailer by @chrislohr.
